data.Name: Jason Nevins
data.Bio: JASON NEVINS IS THE LEADER OF ROCK DANCE! Just listen to his remixes of Duran Duran, Rob Thomas, Kelly Clarkson or Anastacia. Even before the media hype on groups like The Killers and Franz Ferdinand- Jason was cranking out tunes with bangin’ club beats and rockin’ guitars. If you listen to any sort of dance music or even pop radio then I’m sure you have heard of Jason Nevins or at least one of his productions. A talented producer and remixer, Jason’s name became ubiquitous with the release of the now classic: Jason Nevins vs. Read more on Last.fm
